hero.title: Reliable Freight Transport Solutions
hero.subtitle: SACITIR - Your trusted partner for safe and efficient cargo transportation across the nation

about.title: About SACITIR
about.description: With over 20 years of experience in freight transportation, SACITIR has established itself as a leading logistics company, providing reliable and efficient transport solutions nationwide.

about.title: About SACITIR
about.subtitle: Connecting businesses nationwide with reliable freight solutions since 2003

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 2003, SACITIR began as a small family business with a vision to provide reliable freight transport services. Over the years, we have grown to become one of the most trusted logistics companies in the region.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide safe, reliable, and efficient freight transport solutions while maintaining the highest standards of customer service and operational excellence.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading freight transport company, recognized for our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide our operations and relationships

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: We prioritize the safety of our drivers, cargo, and the communities we serve through rigorous safety protocols and training.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Our commitment to on-time delivery and consistent service has made us a trusted partner for businesses nationwide.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: We build lasting relationships by understanding our customers' needs and delivering personalized logistics solutions.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to reducing our environmental impact through efficient routes and eco-friendly practices.

heritage.familyDesc: Built on family values and personal relationships
heritage.growthDesc: Expanded from local to nationwide operations
heritage.leadershipDesc: Recognized as a trusted logistics partner

cta.title: Ready to Partner with Us?
cta.description: Experience the SACITIR difference with our reliable freight transport solutions

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive freight transport and logistics solutions

cta.title: Ready to Ship Your Cargo?
cta.description: Get a free quote today and experience our reliable freight transport services

national.title: National Transport
national.description: Complete freight transport services covering all major routes across the country. We ensure your cargo reaches its destination safely and on time.

refrigerated.title: Refrigerated Transport
refrigerated.description: Specialized temperature-controlled transport for perishable goods, pharmaceuticals, and other temperature-sensitive cargo.

logistics.title: Logistics Solutions
logistics.description: Complete logistics management including warehousing, distribution, and supply chain optimization services.
